sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Form, Table, Card, Row, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Pagination } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; import '../index.css' class BondPricingTwo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bonds: [], label: 'Attach .csv', totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0, totalDate: null, month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), hideTable: true, showCards: { visibility: 'hidden' }, export: "Value as of, Serial #, Series, Denomination, Issue Date, Next Accrual, Final Maturity, Issue Price, Interest, Value", exportResults: [], bondCount: [1, 2], }; this.setFilename = this.setFilename.bind(this) this.formatDate = this.formatDate.bind(this) this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) this.onUpdateClick = this.onUpdateClick.bind(this) this.appendToTable = this.appendToTable.bind(this) this.exportData = this.exportData.bind(this) } formatDate(value_date) { const months = { "01": "Jan.", "02": "Feb.", "03": "March", "04": "April", "05": "May", "06": "June", "07": "July", "08": "Aug.", "09": "Sept", "10": "Oct", "11": "Nov", "12": "Dec" } let month = value_date.split('/')[0] if (month.length === 1) { month = '0' + month } let year = value_date.split('/')[1] let month_string = months[month] + ' 1, ' + year return month_string } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } exportData() { let exports = (this.state.export).split(',') let export_data = [] let i = 0 while ((i + 10) <= exports.length) { export_data.push(exports.slice(i, i + 10)) i += 10 } export_data.push(["", "", "", '$' + this.state.totalDenomination, "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2)]) this.setState({ exportResults: export_data }) } handleClickX(element) { element.parentNode.parentNode.remove() if ((document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByClassName('bond-row')).length > 0) { this.onUpdateClick(); } else { this.setState({ totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0 }) } } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onUpdateClick() { let rows = document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tr') let bonds = [] let vMonth = document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value let vYear = document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value for (let i = 1; i < rows.length; i++) { let series = rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[1].innerHTML let denomination = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[2].innerHTML).substring(1) let serialNumber = rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[0].innerHTML let iMonth = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[3].innerHTML).split('/')[0] let iYear = (rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[3].innerHTML).split('/')[1] let bond = { 'vMonth': vMonth, 'vYear': vYear, 'series': series, 'denomination': denomination, 'serialNumber': serialNumber, 'iMonth': iMonth, 'iYear': iYear, } bonds.push(bond) } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/update', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { let bondRows = document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tbody')[0] bondRows.remove() let exports = [["Value as of", "Serial #", "Series", "Denomination", "Issue Date", "Next Accrual", "Final Maturity", "Issue Price", "Interest", "Value"]] for (let i = 0; i < response[0].length; i++) { this.appendToTable(response[0][i]) exports.push([ response[0][i]['vDate'], response[0][i]['serialNumber'], response[0][i]['series'], '$' + response[0][i]['denomination'], response[0][i]['iDate'], '$' + response[0][i]['iPrice'], response[0][i]['aDate'], response[0][i]['mDate'], '$' + response[0][i]['value'], '$' + response[0][i]['interest'] ]) } exports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + response[1]['totalDenominations'], "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalPrices']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalInterests']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalValues']).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) this.setState({ exportResults: exports }) }) } appendToTable(currentBond) { const bondTable = document.getElementById('bond-table') let bondBody = null if (bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tbody').length === 0) { bondBody = document.createElement('tbody') bondTable.append(bondBody) } else { bondBody = bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tbody')[0] } if (currentBond['interest'] < 0) { currentBond['interest'] = 0 } bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tr')[0].style.visibility = 'visible' let bondRow = bondBody.insertRow(); bondRow.className = "bond-row" bondRow.style.textAlign = 'center' bondRow.insertCell(0).innerHTML = currentBond['serialNumber'] bondRow.insertCell(1).innerHTML = currentBond['series'] let cell2 = bondRow.insertCell(2) cell2.className = 'bond-denomination' cell2.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(currentBond['denomination']) bondRow.insertCell(3).innerHTML = currentBond['iDate'] bondRow.insertCell(4).innerHTML = currentBond['aDate'] bondRow.insertCell(5).innerHTML = currentBond['mDate'] let cell6 = bondRow.insertCell(6) cell6.className = 'bond-price' cell6.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['iPrice']).toFixed(2)) let cell7 = bondRow.insertCell(7) cell7.className = 'bond-interest' cell7.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['interest']).toFixed(2)) let cell8 = bondRow.insertCell(8) cell8.className = 'bond-value' cell8.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['value']).toFixed(2)) cell8.style.position = 'relative' let span = document.createElement('span') span.innerHTML = '×' span.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true') span.style.border = 'none'; let button = document.createElement('button') button.onclick = () => { this.handleClickX(button) }; button.className = 'close' button.style.position = 'absolute' button.style.right = '-1em' button.append(span); cell8.append(button); this.exportData() } setFilename(e) { if (e.target.files.length > 0) { this.setState({ label: e.target.files[0].name }) } if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false, showCards: { visibility: 'visible' } }) } let vMonth = document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value let vYear = document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const bonds = reader.result const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds, vMonth, vYear }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/upload', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { let exports = [] exports.push(['Lookup Date', 'Serial Number', 'Series', 'Bond Amount', 'Issue Date', 'Next Accrual', 'Final Maturity', 'Issue Price', 'Interest', 'Interest Rate', 'Bond Value']) for (let i = 0; i < response[0].length; i++) { let values = [ response['vDate'], response['serialNumber'], response['series'], '$' + response['denomination'], response['iDate'], response['aDate'], response['mDate'], '$' + response['iPrice'], '$' + response['interest'], '$' + response['value'] ] exports.push(values); } this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) exports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + response[1]['totalDenominations'], "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalPrices']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalInterests']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalValues']).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ bonds: response[0], exportResults: exports }) }) } reader.readAsText(e.target.files[0]); } convertValues(value) { return value.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",") } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> ATTACHMENT
{this.state.exportResults.length > 0 ?
0 ? this.state.exportResults : ''}>+ [Export]
: null} VALUED AS OF {this.state.totalDate} TOTAL FACE VALUE ${this.convertValues(this.state.totalDenomination)} TOTAL COST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2))} TOTAL INTEREST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2))} TOTAL VALUE ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2))}
{ this.state.bonds.length > 0 ? {this.state.bonds .slice(this.currentPage * 8, (this.currentPage + 1) * 8) .map((bond, i) => ( ))}
Serial Number Bond Type Bond Amount Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Value
{bond['serialNumber']} {bond['series']} ${this.convertValues(bond['denomination'])} {bond['iDate']} {bond['aDate']} {bond['mDate']} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['iPrice']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['interest']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['value']).toFixed(2))}
{this.state.bonds.length > 0 ? {this.state.bondCount.map((i) => ( {i} ))} : null} : null}
) } } export default BondPricingTwo;
